conbody.p: On-Premises offers enterprise customers control, security, compliance, cost-effectiveness, all come with the high performance offerings of features. Customers have complete control over their testing environment, ensuring their data is secure and compliant, and can leverage their existing infrastructure for cost savings and better performance. It is an ideal solution for organizations with strict security requirements and privacy policies that require complete control and flexibility over their testing environments.
This article introduces the concept and offerings of On-Premises.
